testcase.name: user enter wrong email

testcase.classname: new user should register to the website successfully
testcase.name: user enter password less than 6 characters

testcase.classname: new user should register to the website successfully
testcase.name: user enter confirm password don't match the password
testcase.system-out: Given user open browser and navigates to home page for registration.........passed When user navigate to register page and enter first name "m" last name "m" email "m@m.m" password "123456" confirm pass "7891011".passed And click REGISTER..........................................................passed Then error confirm password don't match the password........................passed

testcase.classname: new user should register to the website successfully
testcase.name: user enter valid information
testcase.system-out: Given user open browser and navigates to home page for registration.........passed When user navigate to register page and enter first name "mahmoud" last name "ali" email "mahmoudali@example.com" password "password" confirm pass "password".passed And click REGISTER..........................................................passed Then registered successfully then click on logout...........................passed

testcase.classname: new user should register to the website successfully

testcase.classname: user should be able to login successfully
testcase.name: user enter no data
testcase.system-out: Given user open browser and navigates to home page..........................passed When user navigate to login page and enter email "" password "".............passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then error message please enter email.......................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login successfully
testcase.name: user login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user open browser and navigates to home page..........................passed When user navigate to login page and enter email "m@m.m" password "invalid".passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then error message login was unsuccessful...................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login successfully
testcase.name: user enter invalid email format
testcase.system-out: Given user open browser and navigates to home page..........................passed When user navigate to login page and enter email "m" password ""............passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then error message wrong email..............................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login successfully
testcase.name: user login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user open browser and navigates to home page..........................passed When user navigate to login page and enter email "mahmoudali@example.com" password "password".passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user log in successfully and redirected to homepage....................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to switch between currencies
testcase.name: unauthenticated user could switch between currencies
testcase.system-out: Given user open browser then navigate to home page..........................passed When user select "Euro" then the featured product prices is switched to Euro.passed And user select "US Dollar" then the featured product prices is switched US dollar.passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to switch between currencies
testcase.name: new registered user could switch between currencies
testcase.system-out: Given user open browser then navigate to home page..........................passed And user click on register from top menu....................................passed And enter first name "mahmoud" last name "ali" email "mahmoudd@ali1.com" password "password" confirm pass "password".passed And press REGISTER..........................................................passed And user click on continue button...........................................passed When user select "Euro" then the featured product prices is switched to Euro.passed And user select "US Dollar" then the featured product prices is switched US dollar.passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to switch between currencies
testcase.name: authenticated user could switch between currencies
testcase.system-out: Given user open browser then navigate to home page..........................passed And user click on login button then enter email "mahmoudd@ali1.com" password "password".passed And press login button......................................................passed When user select "Euro" then the featured product prices is switched to Euro.passed And user select "US Dollar" then the featured product prices is switched US dollar.passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to search product by name or SKU
testcase.name: unauthenticated user can search products
testcase.system-out: Given open browser and go to home page......................................passed When user enter invalid product name as "bla bla"...........................passed Then user is redirected to a page with no products..........................passed And roll back to home.......................................................passed When enter valid product full name as "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" and click enter.passed Then user is redirected to a page contains "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" product.passed And roll back to home.......................................................passed When enter valid product partial name as "Apple" and click enter............passed Then user is redirected to a page contains "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" product.passed And roll back to home.......................................................passed When enter SKU: "AP_MBP_13" and click enter.................................passed Then user is redirected to a page contains "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" product.passed And quit the browser........................................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to search product by name or SKU
testcase.name: newly registered can search product
testcase.system-out: Given open browser and go to home page......................................passed When choose register from header............................................passed And register "mahmoud" "ali" "mahmoud1@aali.com" "123456" "123456"..........passed And register and continue pressed...........................................passed When user enter invalid product name as "bla bla"...........................passed Then user is redirected to a page with no products..........................passed And roll back to home.......................................................passed When enter valid product full name as "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" and click enter.passed Then user is redirected to a page contains "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" product.passed And roll back to home.......................................................passed When enter valid product partial name as "Apple" and click enter............passed Then user is redirected to a page contains "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" product.passed And roll back to home.......................................................passed When enter SKU: "AP_MBP_13" and click enter.................................passed Then user is redirected to a page contains "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" product.passed And quit the browser........................................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to search product by name or SKU
testcase.name: authenticated can search product
testcase.system-out: Given open browser and go to home page......................................passed When choose login from header...............................................passed And login "mahmoud1@aali.com" "123456".....................................passed And login pressed...........................................................passed When user enter invalid product name as "bla bla"...........................passed Then user is redirected to a page with no products..........................passed When enter valid product full name as "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" and click enter.passed Then user is redirected to a page contains "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" product.passed When enter valid product partial name as "Apple" and click enter............passed Then user is redirected to a page contains "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" product.passed When enter SKU: "AP_MBP_13" and click enter.................................passed Then user is redirected to a page contains "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" product.passed And quit the browser........................................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to switch between sliders
testcase.name: user switch between sliders and click
testcase.failure:
Given browser opened and in home page.......................................passed When user click slider control "1"..........................................passed Then user is switched to slider image "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/images/thumbs/0000079_banner_1.jpg".passed When user click slider control "2"..........................................passed Then user is switched to slider image "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/images/thumbs/0000080_banner_2.jpg".failed Then quitt..................................................................skipped

testcase.classname: user can add product to wishlist successfully
testcase.name: user add product to wishlist from featured products and product categories
testcase.system-out: Given browser open to home page.............................................passed When user scroll down to featured products and click "Build your own computer" product.passed And user click on add to wishlist button from featured product details page.passed Then go back to home page...................................................passed When user click on digital downloads from product category top menu.........passed And click on "If You Wait (donation)" product...............................passed And user click on add to wishlist button from category product details page.passed Then go back to home page...................................................passed And user select wishlist....................................................passed And check "Build your own computer" and "If You Wait (donation)" products are added to wish list and quit.passed

testcase.classname: user can add product to cart successfully
testcase.name: user add product to cart from featured products and product categories
testcase.system-out: Given browser navigated to home page........................................passed When user scroll to featured products and click "Build your own computer" product.passed And user click on add to cart button from featured product details page.....passed Then navigate to home page..................................................passed When user click on digital downloads from product category menu.............passed And click "If You Wait (donation)" product..................................passed And user click on add to cart button from category product details page.....passed Then navigate to home page..................................................passed And user select shopping cart...............................................passed And check "Build your own computer" and "If You Wait (donation)" products are added and quit.passed
